name: Azata Magic
summary: Your lineage traces back to the realm of Elysium, and you can harness its magic using this connection.
description:
Your lineage traces back to the realm of Elysium, and you can harness its magic using this connection. You can cast glitterdust and remove paralysis each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.Traits

Aasimar: A creature with this trait has the aasimar versatile heritage. Aasimars are planar scions descended from celestial beings. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by aasimars.
